titleStmt.title: Three sermons vpon Marke, the ninth chapter, 22.23. verses Containing fifteene doctrines, the particulars whereof appeare in the next pages following. / By Robert Cleauer.
titleStmt.author: Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T C[reede] for William Welbie, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swan,

notesStmt.note: This item also appears as part of STC (2nd ed.) 6945.6 at reel 1955:15.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swan
